dmca.title: [EV1-C1432536F] Copyright/AUP/TOS violation on a theplanet.com-hosted domain "userlan
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

Conversation: [EV1-C1432536F] Copyright/AUP/TOS violation on a
theplanet.com-hosted domain "userland.com"
Subject: [EV1-C1432536F] Copyright/AUP/TOS violation on a
theplanet.com-hosted domain "userland.com"

 (multipart/mixed)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
MIME element (text/plain)
To whom it may concern: 
 
It appears that the domain userland.com is hosted on a theplanet.com
server, and I am writing to request that material posted there be
removed because it violates my copyright. 
 
Specifically, I am writing to assert that I am the copyright holder of
the image named "http://scott.userland.com/images/unlimited.jpg", a
photograph of a read Hawker Sea Fury race aircraft.  A stolen copy of my
original image is displayed at the following URL: 
 
        http://radio.weblogs.com/0119659/categories/myHobbies/ 
 
without permission in contravention of US and international copyright
law. 
 
The original of this image was copied from photo galleries on the
airrace.org Web site in violation of the Terms of Use of that Web site. 
 
Two days ago I used the contact form on the user's page to request that
the image be removed, and received an auto-reply indicating that the
message was transmitted, but I have received no response from the user. 
 
I also wrote the attached message to "webmaster@userland.com" requesting
that the image be removed, but I have received no response. 
 
Therefore I feel I must contact you as the host of this domain to
request that you enforce your AUP/TOS and remove this content at once. 
 
I would appreciate your prompt attention to this matter, and a reply
indicating that the offending material has been removed or that the site
has been shut down. 
 
Thanks and regards, 
 
Mark Johnston

MIME element (text/plain) 
  
 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mark Johnston
> Sent: Wednesday, October 18, 2006 1:41 PM
> To: 'webmaster@userland.com' 
> Subject: Copyright violation on userland.com
> Importance: High
>  
> Scott Young has posted my copyrighted photo of an aircraft named 
> September Fury here:
>  
>         http://radio.weblogs.com/0119659/categories/myHobbies/
>  
> As part of his blog entry about "Air Racing" [also referenced by: 
>  
>          
> http://scott.userland.com/categories/myHobbies/2005/10/05.html#a534
>  
> ]
>  
> I wrote to Scott a couple of days ago complaining about this and 
> requesting that the image be removed, but since I've received no 
> answer, am sending this message in the hopes that somebody out there 
> gives a damn about copyright issues.
>  
> I would appreciate some kind of acknowledgement that my request has 
> been heard and will be respected.
>  
> Thanks and regards,
>  
> Mark Johnston
 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
